oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pleasant Grove Baptist Church: cornerstone
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of church cornestone laid in brickwork. Cornerstone inscription reads, "Pleasant Grove Baptist Church; Founded 1869; Rededicated 1976; In memory of these deacons, Cyrus E. Mooney - Chairman, C. Gaines - W. Irving - H. Henegar, 1986; Deacon Board, Andrew Johnson - Chairman, H.E. Henley, M. Kirkpatrick, J. Kirkpatrick, B. Bradford, J. Hassler, J. Watkins, C. Taylor, M. Dotson, R. Phillips, J. Crawford, R. Jarrett, J. Timberlake, C. Swafford, D. Johnson, A. Johnson, W. Rankin; Trustee Board, Avery Johnson - Chairman, C. Scott, F. Campbell, L. Swafford, R. Thompson, L. Hunt, R. Young, W. Rankin, R. McKissic; Ministers, A. Crawford - H.M. Johnson, Edward S. Robinson, Pastor."

Founded in 1869, Pleasant Grove Baptist Church's current building dates to 1976. Since the completion of fieldwork in 1998, the exterior of the church has underwent further renovation. The church is located catty-corner from the Household of Faith COGIC building. A city park resides to the rear and side of the building.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
cornerstones; brickwork
